ChangeList.Description: Enabled the `$filter` query parameter for the [List](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/listitem-list?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [listItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Enabled the `$filter` query parameter for the [List](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/listitem-list?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [listItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added support for the application permission `Sites.Archive.All` to the [site: archive](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-archive?view=graph-rest-beta) method.
Added support for the application permission `Sites.Archive.All` to the [site: unarchive](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-unarchive?view=graph-rest-beta) method.

Added the [site: archive](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-archive?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [site: unarchive](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-unarchive?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **contentStream** property to the [driveItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/driveItem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [recycleBin](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recycleBin?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [recycleBinItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recycleBinItem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and a supported method.
Added the **recycleBin** relationship to the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **operations** relationship to the [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/list?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [richLongRunningOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/richLongRunningOperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added the **operations** relationship to the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [addCopyFromContentTypeHub](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/contenttype-addCopyFromContentTypeHub?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [contentType](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contentType?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [getCompatibleHubContentTypes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/contenttype-getCompatibleHubContentTypes?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [contentType](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contentType?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Introduced the taxonomy API [store](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-store?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and associated methods.
Introduced the taxonomy API [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and associated methods.
Introduced the taxonomy API [set](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-set?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and associated methods.
Introduced the taxonomy API [term](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-term?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and associated methods.
Introduced the taxonomy API [relation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-relation?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and associated methods.

Added the [termStore.store](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-store?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) navigation property to the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) entity.
Added the **parentSiteId** property to the [termStore.group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Introduced the taxonomy API, including the [termStore.store](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-store?view=graph-rest-beta), [termStore.term](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-term?view=graph-rest-beta), [termStore.set](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-set?view=graph-rest-beta), and [termStore.relation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-relation?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.

Added the [geolocationColumn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/geolocationcolumn?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. The **geolocationColumn** resource applies to the [columnDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/columnDefinition?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the **followedSites** navigation property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to [list the sites followed by the signed-in user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/sites-list-followed?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: user,list the sites followed by the signed-in user

ChangeList.Description: Added the **followedSites** navigation property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity to [list the sites followed by the signed-in user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/sites-list-followed?view=graph-rest-1.0).
ChangeList.Target: user,list the sites followed by the signed-in user

ChangeList.Description: Added the **dataLocatonCode** property on the [siteCollection](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sitecollection?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **tenantId** property on the [sharepointIds](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sharepointids?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [followSite](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-follow?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added the [unfollowSite](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-unfollow?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **subscriptions** navigation property to the [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/list?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
